Plot: To get royal backing on a needed drainage project, a poor French lord must learn to play the delicate games of wit at court at Versailles.
Title: Ridicule
Writer: Rémi Waterhouse (scenario), Michel Fessler (screenplay), Eric Vicaut (collaboration), Rémi Waterhouse (dialogue)
Actors: Charles Berling, Jean Rochefort, Fanny Ardant, Judith Godrèche
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 14 nominations.
